summary: Apple co-founder Steve Jobs dropped out of Reed College after six months. He took a calligraphy class that turned out to be crucial to the creation of the Mac computer. Jobs: You have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future.
headline: Apple founder Steve Jobs says dropping out of college was one of his best decisions

summary: Death is the single best invention of life. It clears out the old to make way for the new. There is no reason not to follow your heart. Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
headline: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way to make decisions
